alex.background: Ex-mercenary, participated in artifact hunts, left after incident in the 4th dimension.

participants.group: Drunk member of Clan Enhanced Machines

event_details.initial_interaction: Drunk dumbs want to order more bear but make this without respect

actions.description: Broke the face of this bastard
Alex has non letal bullets charged shootgun buld in in left arm

outcome.injuries: Group has scratches and need medecal aid, all alibe
outcome.resolution: Medical service take care about the baddies, the clan came to the bar say sorry and pay extra for destorbing Alex

analysis.skill_assessment: Alex demonstrated a high level of physical and possibly augmented combat skills, indicative of his mercenary background.
analysis.behavioral_note: Despite his quiet demeanor, Alex is highly capable and will respond with force if provoked.
analysis.recommendations: Avoid disruptive behavior in the Misfits Bar. Engage with Alex respectfully, acknowledging his past and capabilities.
